abilities.name: Body Odor
abilities.effect: As long as Weezing is the Active Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokémon that has any Poké-Bodies between turns.

attacks.name: Mist Attack
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
